sections.title: Sleepless Detective (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Sleepless Detective class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Sleepless Detective)
sections.description: Sleepless detectives gain no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base class or race.

sections.title: Canny Sleuth ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Sleepless Detective)
sections.description: Adds Intelligence bonus to Perception, Sense Motive, and Diplomacy checks to gather information, in addition to normal ability modifiers.

sections.title: Forensic Thaumaturgy (Su) (Sleepless Detective)
sections.description: Casts detect magic at will and can determine when lingering magical auras were created or destroyed by treating them as one category stronger.

sections.title: Sneak Attack ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Sleepless Detective)
sections.description: Functions exactly like rogue sneak attack, dealing +1d6 damage every three levels and stacking with other sneak attack bonuses.

sections.title: Follow Clues ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Sleepless Detective)
sections.description: Use Perception to track like Survival skill, or move at normal speed while tracking with Perception without penalty if already possessing this ability.

sections.title: Deductive Examination (Sp) (Sleepless Detective)
sections.description: Can use residual tracking spell three times per day as a spell-like ability.

sections.title: Eye for Detail ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Sleepless Detective)
sections.description: Automatically receives Perception checks to notice traps, doors, and clues within 10 feet, rolling twice if already having similar abilities.

sections.title: Hematomancy (Sp) (Sleepless Detective)
sections.description: Can use blood biography spell three times per day, accepting any bodily fluid or body part in place of blood.

sections.title: Thoughtful Reexamining ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Sleepless Detective)
sections.description: Functions as the advanced rogue talent thoughtful reexamining, or grants one additional daily use if already possessed.

sections.title: Discern Lies (Sp) (Sleepless Detective)
sections.description: Can use discern lies spell for rounds per day equal to class level, activated as an immediate action.

sections.title: Predictive Riposte ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Sleepless Detective)
sections.description: Designates target for +4 insight bonus to AC and can make sneak attack ripostes when their melee attacks miss.

sections.title: Pierce Deception (Sp) (Sleepless Detective)
sections.description: Can see with true seeing for rounds per day equal to class level, activated as a free action.

sections.title: Reconstruction (Su) (Sleepless Detective)
sections.description: Once per day, examines area or item for 10 minutes to view past 24 hours of events within 60 feet as if scrying was present.
